remarks: Value of the named tanh function.  Here we show the simple conversion to the conventional form used in set.mm, using the definition given by ~ df-tanh .  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 10-May-2015.)
statement: tanhval-named $p |- ( A e. ( `' cosh " ( CC \ { 0 } ) ) -> ( tanh ` A ) = ( ( tan ` ( _i x. A ) ) / _i ) ) $.
